page.title: 15A local farmers day
page.content: I have to get up early and be ready to start work at 7am.I take a packed lunch and tea. First of all I go to the farm office to get the jobs for the day,then I go to fill up the tractor with deisel and check the water and tyres. At this time of year my first job is usually "straw turning".I attach special implement to the tractor and then turn the hay in the field.Dinnertime is about 12 noon and I then go back to the farm to pick up the bailer.The afternoon is spent bailing up the hay.After tea some more tractors and trailers come into the field and the hay is taken to the hay stack.At 8pm I finish work.It is a long day being a farmer.
